title: Who are the people a woman can go in front of without hijab? - assim al hakeem
transcript: my question is who are those rightful person in front of which a woman can stay without wearing his job they are her maharams permanent maharams such as her father and all those who go up father grandfather for their paternal maternal her sons and all those who go down like her grandsons and great great grandsons her siblings Brothers her nephews the sons of her brothers or the sons of her sisters her uncles whether paternal or maternal her father-in-law her son-in-law these are permanently mahrams for her for life whether she's divorced or widowed Etc they're still maharam and so on and Allah Knows Best
